name: Swords to Plowshares
description: Swords to Plowshares is a Bay Area-based nonprofit organization dedicated to supporting all veterans every step of the way. They are dedicated to supporting nearly 3,000 homeless, low-income and at-risk veterans in the Bay Area every year. They offer employment and job training, supportive housing programs, permanent housing placement, counseling and case management, and legal services. Services are free for Bay Area veterans and their families.
